remark.p: Non-career appointee. Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Saint Vincent and the Grenadines); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Saint Lucia); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Saint Kitts and Nevis); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Dominica); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Antigua and Barbuda); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Barbados).
